name: C5 Simulator
overview: A top-down racing game which allows you to race C5's around a track, against a friend or computer or even on your own in time trial mode. Who needs fast formula 1 racing when you can race a three speed plastic C5 around the track? The game features a flat battery mode for 2 players only, and fastest lap/race times and championship tables are all automatically saved. A track editor is enclosed.
